colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @240A *, ,CES GANGS CAN MKHAS GRUB YONGS KYI GTZUG RGYAN KUN MKHYEN BLA MA 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I RDO RJES MDZAD PA'I GRUB MTHA' CHEN MO 'DI NYID DPAR KHANG BKRA SHIS MTHONG SMON NAS RGYU RKYEN SBYAR TE, SPAR DU BSGRUBS PA'I TSE SMON TSIG DGOS TSUL, DO DAM PA DANG, ZHU DAG PA SO SO NAS BSKUL BA LTAR, ^BTZUN PA 'JAM DBYANGS THUB BSTAN NYI MAS CHOS GRVA CHEN PO BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU SBYAR BA'O,, ,,SHU BHA MASTU SARBA DZA GA TAm,, ,,
